title: Social Security 'rule' often disregarded by Americans, yet beneficial for some

sora_prompt.scene1: A wide shot of a bustling city street with diverse faces, showcasing the American populace.
sora_prompt.scene2: Close-up on hands signing 'Social Security', highlighting its significance and widespread disregard among citizens.

scene3.description: Data overlay showing statistics of Americans who benefit from Social Security, despite common misconceptions about it being a mistake.

sora_prompt.voiceover: @lee627 narrates calmly and factually: 'Despite experts labeling the reliance on Social Security as mistaken for many young adults today, millions continue to find financial stability through this program.'

outro.description: Quiet outro with a gentle fade-out of images showing various American families enjoying their retirement years thanks in part to Social Security benefits.
